name: Alibaba
description: Chinese multinational technology company specializing in e-commerce, retail, cloud computing, AI, and digital services through platforms like Alibaba.com, Taobao, and Alibaba Cloud.

zh-Hans.description: 中国跨国科技公司,专注于电子商务、零售、云计算、AI 和数字服务,旗下拥有阿里巴巴、淘宝和阿里云等平台。

de.description: Chinesisches multinationales Technologieunternehmen spezialisiert auf E-Commerce, Einzelhandel, Cloud Computing, KI und digitale Dienste.
